label: AB_tI8_141_a_b-001
title: NbP (``40'') Structure
comments: When $c/a=2$, the atoms in this lattice are on the sites of the face-centered cubic lattice. Thus (Lu, 1991) use this lattice for their structural stability studies, and arbitrarily assign this lattice a Strukturbericht designation of ``40.'' Note that (Sch\"{o}nberg, 1954) gives the space group as $I4_{1}22$ \#98 but, as (Villars, 1991) notes, the coordinates given increase the symmetry to $I4_{1}/amd$ \#141.
